original_text: And Barzillai said unto the king, How long have I to live, that I should go up with the king unto Jerusalem?
korean_text: 바르실래가 왕께 아뢰되 내 생명의 날이 얼마나 있사옵겠기에 어찌 왕과 함께 예루살렘으로 올라가리이까

sentences.original_text: And Barzillai said unto the king
How long have I to live
that I should go up with the king
